uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.tool.bean

Class RecentlyVisitedBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.tool.bean.RecentlyVisitedBean

  • public class RecentlyVisitedBean
extends Object
    RecentlyVisitedBean is a bean which stores in session a list of all the pages you have recently visited.
    Author:
    andrew
